UInt8 InitBluetooth (UInt32 bluetooth_baudrate, UInt8 *bluetooth_name)
 Init bluetooth module at the specified baudrate.

Detailed Description

Bluetooth include.

Initialization of the POB-TOOTH module on the pob-eye.

The bluetooth communication use the UART: to send and receive data from other bluetooth device, you must use the uart functions

See also:
uart.h

Define Documentation

#define BLUETOOTH_FAILED   2

initialization of bluetooth failed

#define BLUETOOTH_OK   0

no error

#define BLUETOOTH_WRONG_BAUDRATE   1

wrong baudrate selected

Function Documentation

UInt8 InitBluetooth ( UInt32  bluetooth_baudrate,
UInt8 *  bluetooth_name 
)

Init bluetooth module at the specified baudrate.

Parameters:
bluetooth_baudrate Baudrate
bluetooth_name Name of the device on the bluetooth network. If NULL, default name is use (POBTOOTH)
Returns:
0 if success, else error code
